dcterms:description: This dataset contains 224 subjects, including 147 patients suffering from Orthostatic Hypotension (OH) and 77 healthy controls (HCs). All subjects were scanned to obtain DTI and fMRI images. Data augmentation was applied to balance the dataset, resulting in a total of 1470 brain networks with OH and 1540 HC brain networks.
dcterms:title: Orthostatic Hypotension (OH) Dataset

dcterms:description: This dataset contains 512 subjects, including 250 cognitive normal (CN) subjects, 85 subjects with mild cognitive impairment (MCI), 84 subjects with early MCI (EMCI), 35 subjects with late MCI (LMCI), and 58 subjects with Alzheimer's disease (AD). Subjects with MCI, EMCI, LMCI, and AD were all regarded as patients in the experiment.
dcterms:title: Alzheimerâ€™s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) dataset
